verses.verse: For Zion's <S%H6726><s%> sake <S%H4616><s%> will I not hold <S%H2814><s%> my peace, <S%H2814><s%> and for Jerusalem's <S%H3389><s%> sake <S%H4616><s%> I will not rest, <S%H8252><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the righteousness <S%H6664><s%> thereof go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> as brightness, <S%H5051><s%> and the salvation <S%H3444><s%> thereof as a lamp <S%H3940><s%> that burns. <S%H1197><s%>

And the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> your righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> your glory: <S%H3519><s%> and you shall be called <S%H7121><s%> by a new <S%H2319><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall name. <S%H8034><s%>

You shall also be a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H8597><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and a royal <S%H4410><s%> diadem <S%H6797><s%> in the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be termed <S%H559><s%> Forsaken; <S%H5800><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall your land <S%H776><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> be termed <S%H559><s%> Desolate: <S%H8077><s%> but you shall be called <S%H7121><s%> Hephzibah, <S%H2657><s%> and your land <S%H776><s%> Beulah: <S%H1166><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delights <S%H2654><s%> in you, and your land <S%H776><s%> shall be married. <S%H1166><s%>

For as a young <S%H5288><s%> <S%H970><s%> man marries <S%H1166><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> so shall your sons <S%H1121><s%> marry <S%H1166><s%> you: and as the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> rejoices <S%H4885><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the bride, <S%H3618><s%> so shall your God <S%H430><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you.

I have set <S%H6485><s%> watchmen <S%H8104><s%> on your walls, <S%H2346><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which shall never <S%H3808><s%> hold <S%H2814><s%> their peace <S%H2814><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> nor night: <S%H3915><s%> you that make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> keep not silence, <S%H1824><s%>

And give <S%H5414><s%> him no <S%H408><s%> rest, <S%H1824><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> he establish, <S%H3559><s%> and till <S%H5704><s%> he make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a praise <S%H8416><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> by his right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and by the arm <S%H2220><s%> of his strength, <S%H5797><s%> Surely <S%H518><s%> I will no <S%H518><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> your corn <S%H1715><s%> to be meat <S%H3978><s%> for your enemies; <S%H341><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger <S%H5236><s%> shall not drink <S%H8354><s%> your wine, <S%H8492><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> you have labored: <S%H3021><s%>

But they that have gathered <S%H622><s%> it shall eat <S%H398><s%> it, and praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they that have brought <S%H6908><s%> it together shall drink <S%H8354><s%> it in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of my holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

Go <S%H5674><s%> through, <S%H5674><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the gates; <S%H8179><s%> prepare <S%H6437><s%> you the way <S%H1870><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> cast <S%H5549><s%> up, cast <S%H5549><s%> up the highway; <S%H4546><s%> gather <S%H5619><s%> out the stones; <S%H68><s%> lift <S%H7311><s%> up a standard <S%H5251><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has proclaimed <S%H8085><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the world, <S%H776><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> you to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your salvation <S%H3468><s%> comes; <S%H935><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> his reward <S%H7939><s%> is with him, and his work <S%H6468><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And they shall call <S%H7121><s%> them, The holy <S%H6944><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> The redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and you shall be called, <S%H7121><s%> Sought <S%H1875><s%> out, A city <S%H5892><s%> not forsaken. <S%H5800><s%>
